Detailed Description

Base class for different type-specific property descriptors Describes the display of Property values for PropertyItems and IndicatorItems In case of PropertyItems additionally the title and the label of the associated PropertyEditor can be defined Configurable with the APOXI GUI Editor

WString PropertyDescriptor::GetText (  const Property *  property  )  const [virtual]
